thread.title: Always consistently good
thread.title_full: Always consistently good - Review of Premier Inn London Stratford Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: toeatornottoeat
title: Always consistently good
text: We had a very pleasant stay at Stratford east. Premier inn is always consistent in quality and is an excellent place for one or two nights away. The bed was super comfortable as always, and the room was spotlessly clean. A very efficient place and felt secure. Staff friendly, polite and professional.
